description:
Big 5’s Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba’s monsters from deep space where none of Kaiba’s monsters can reach it!  Mokuba’s unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noa has plans to ruin their brotherhood...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uchuu kara no Kougeki Satellite Cannon
宇宙からの攻撃サテライトキャノン
